name: KAIROS (El.Seth)
description:
Due to a sudden siege in the Sky Realm, Kairos, the goddess of chances, is forced to leave the Sanctuary and her brother, Chronos, the god of time. This causes the outbreak of monsters and create havoc in the flow of time. 

In order to rescue Chronos and restore time, she has to find a way to solve the time crisis in Gaia.

On the other hand, Kainan is an amnesiac boy who found himself unable to remember anything. The only clue he has is a strange sword with strange powers.

(Note: Some choices will affect the ending, (but not in the early chapters) so save often!)

Well, that's enough spoilers. Hope you enjoy the game!

Screenshots:




(Feel free to ask questions as there are some tricky parts and riddles)

Game controls:

- Press 'x' for menu or right click. In the menu you can change the formation, game controls, view status, items, equipments, and save.

- Use the arrows to move.

- There are fighting scenes so good luck with that.
